Welcome to my personal website!

I am an Assistant Professor of Economics in the [Department of Economics](https://www.xjtlu.edu.cn/en/study/departments/academic-departments/economics/){target="_blank"} at [International Business School Suzhou](https://www.xjtlu.edu.cn/en/study/departments/international-business-school-suzhou/){target="_blank"}, [Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University](https://www.xjtlu.edu.cn/en/){target="_blank"}. My main research fields are **Monetary Economics** and **International Economics**. My current research focuses on the transition of monetary policy in China.
